text: Ezɨ atrivim amizir igharazibar aghuagha Esta bar a gifonge. A Estan garima an amizir igharaziba bar me gafiragha, an ganganiba bar dera. Amizir igiar igharaziba Estan mɨn atrivimɨn dɨghorim kuarizir pu. Kamaghɨn amizɨ, atrivim kwinɨn dapanir asuam an dapanim garu. Ezɨ Esta Kwin Vastin danganim inigha kwinɨn oto.
